#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define ull unsigned long long
using namespace std;
ull md = 1000000007;
ull mod (ull x)
{
	return x%md;
}
ull fun(int b,int p)
{
	if(p == 0) return 1;
	ull ans = fun(b,p/2);
	ans = mod(ans*ans);
	if(p%2) ans = mod(ans*b);
	return ans;
}
void solve()
{
	string str;
	int l;
	
	scanf("%d",&l);
	cin >> str;
	ull curr = 1;
	ull ans = 0;
	for (int i = 0; i < str.size() && i < l; i++) {
		curr = mod(curr*(str[i]-'a'+1));
		ans = mod(ans+curr);
	}
	int rem  = l > str.size() ? l-str.size() : 0;
	if(l >= str.size()) {
		ans = mod(ans+md-1);
		curr = mod(curr+md-1);
	}
	if (rem) {
		curr = mod(curr*26);
		curr = mod(curr*mod(mod(fun(26,rem)+md-1)*fun(25,md-2)));
		ans = mod(ans+curr);
	}
	printf("%llu\n",ans);
}
int main()
{
	ios::sync_with_stdio(true);
	
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while (t--) {
		solve();
	}
	return 0;
}
